cause.description:
The dover soccer team needs Cam Quimby. He is proof that any fool can play for Dover, cause a good 95% of his soccer knowledge comes from the video game Fifa WC 2006. This is ntohing against him however, since he has the highest winning percentage a DHS goalie has ever had (50%). The problem of course is he is 1-1, but we'll ignore that. The point of this is, well... Peer pressure always wins so i thought i'd give it a go
1. Cam Q must play soccer
2. For extra emphasis Cam Q must play soccer
3. Canada's seal hunt must end immediately (actually that was the example i thought it looked cool)
cause.mission: Get Cam Quimby to play soccer next year...
cause.name: Get Cam Q to play soccer this year
